Room.Name: Main Courtyard East
Room.ShortDescription: This is the preparation area for the knight's jousting run.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side is the main building of Castle Ragnar, and on the west side is a large hedge. Together they form a natural alcove for the wide alley just to the south which is used as a jousting run. Further south is the small arms practice area. Prince Ragnar himself can often be found here, either participating or watching the knights as they charge down the jousting run.
